name: ready_now
description: This React app anticipates how long it takes users to get ready via client-side timers. When logged in, a Flask server captures timestamps in a PostgreSQL database and later aggregates timing records with SQLAlchemy to provide personalized timer estimates. If the user falls behind their initial estimate, the app can text an update to their friend with Twilio. The userâ€™s profile page features D3 data visualizations of their different steps and completion times.
author: Ellen Huffman
